ratings.question_text: What is your overall assessment of this course?

narratives.question_text: How would you summarize AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 for a fellow student? Would you recommend AFAM 505 01/AMST 643 01 to another student? Why or why not?
comments: Highly recommend taking this class or any other with Prof. Gonzalez-Perez. A rare opportunity to critically analyze contemporary fiction in an academic setting.
A great introduction to contemporary Latin American literature. I would definitely recommend it.
It is important because it shows you what is the interest of current literature

narratives.question_text: How did this course deepen your knowledge of your discipline/profession? To what extent did this course contribute to your dissertation/research?
comments: It was extremely helpfulfilled in many gaps of my knowledgeand will help me produce a paper on the subject.

I became very familiar with contemporary Latin American literature and how it interacts with the literary tradition in general. I believe I read some authors that I would be interested in including in my dissertation and definitely authors and texts that I would enjoy writing about in the short-term.
It gave me an idea of what is happening in literature right now and helped me to compare with baroque that I am interested
